name: Space Shield
description:
Play Space Shield and show your skill in this fast paced action game where anticipation and reflexes are the key to success !

Your ship is running low on energy!
Use your directional shields against asteroids to refuel.

Created for Ludum Dare 46 with the theme of "Keep it Alive". 

Controls

Mouse:

Left click to select your active shield

Drag to move your shield to defend against asteroids

Right click to gather all shields

Gamepad

Left stick : Move your shields to defend againts asteroids

Push B to select your active shield

Push A to gather all shields
